registerSuccessDescription: Welcome! Please check your email to verify your account.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new email address for a verification link.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your password to confirm this change.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, science, and sacred spirit of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced facilitators who will support you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find all the resources you need to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks and stay connected with the latest news, events, and reflections from our community.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a traditional Amazonian plant medicine, created by brewing the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. For centuries, indigenous cultures have used it in spiritual ceremonies to facilitate deep healing, introspection, and connection to the natural world.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew contains DMT, a powerful psychedelic compound, and MAOIs from the vine, which allow the DMT to be orally active. This combination induces altered states of consciousness, often leading to profound psychological and spiritual insights. The experience is guided by the Icaros (sacred songs) of the shaman, which direct the healing energy of the ceremony.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is often referred to as a 'master plant' or a teacher. It is believed to possess its own spirit and intelligence, guiding participants through a journey of self-discovery. It can reveal hidden patterns, resolve past traumas, and offer a glimpse into the interconnectedness of all life, fostering a deep sense of peace and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Participants often report a significant reduction in mental clutter, gaining new perspectives on personal challenges and life direction.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The experience can facilitate the release of deeply-rooted emotional blockages and traumas, leading to profound emotional catharsis and relief.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Many feel a renewed or deepened sense of connection to themselves, others, nature, and the universe, fostering a lasting sense of unity and purpose.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a shared sacred space, group ceremonies allow participants to heal in community, drawing strength and support from the collective energy. It's a powerful way to feel connected and understood on your journey.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and focused experience, private ceremonies offer a one-on-one setting with the guide. This allows for highly personalized attention and a deeply tailored healing journey.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the compassionate and experienced individuals who will hold the space for your transformation. Each of our guides brings a unique blend of traditional wisdom and professional care to ensure a safe, supportive, and profound journey for every participant.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. Changes will be saved to the database.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide either an image URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the guide from the database.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparing for an Ayahuasca ceremony is a vital step that honors the medicine and your own healing process. Following these guidelines will help purify your body, calm your mind, and open your spirit to receive the deepest benefits of the experience.
preparationProcessDescription: From initial diet to post-ceremony integration, each step is designed to maximize your healing and growth.
ceremonyProcessDescription: Understanding the flow of the ceremony, from the opening to the closing, helps create a sense of safety and trust.
experienceProcessDescription: Learn about the nature of the visions and the emotional and physical releases that can occur during the journey.
integrationProcessDescription: The real work begins after the ceremony. We provide tools to help you integrate the lessons into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: Three days before and after the ceremony, we recommend following these guidelines to purify your body and honor the medicine.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, quinoa)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Grilled chicken or fish (without strong seasonings)
• Plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red and processed meats
• Dairy and fermented foods
• Refined sugars and spicy foods
• Caffeine and alcohol
• Sexual intercourse
mentalPrepSubtitle: A calm and open mind is the best vessel for this journey. Here are some practices to help you prepare.
meditationDescription: Daily meditation, even for just 10 minutes, can help calm the nervous system and increase self-awareness.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you hope to heal or understand. A clear intention acts as a guiding light during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Writing down your thoughts and feelings can help clarify your intentions and process any anxieties that arise.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring deep-seated emotions to the surface. It is a process of purification. Allow yourself to feel without judgment, trusting that what comes up is ready to be healed. Surrender to the process, and know that you are held in a safe and supportive space.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable, layered clothing (white or light colors recommended)
  • A blanket and a pillow or cushion for sitting
  • A water bottle
essentialsList:
• A journal and pen to record insights after the ceremony
  • An open heart and a curious mind
  • Any personal sacred items you wish to have with you (crystals, photos, etc.)
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: Especially heart, liver, or kidney issues, or high blood pressure.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication?
questionnaireMedicationDesc: Including antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs), supplements, or other psychoactive substances.
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements:
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions?
questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: Such as schizophrenia, psychosis, or bipolar disorder.
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about the mental health history:
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with psychedelics or plant medicine?
questionnaireExperienceDesc: This helps us understand your level of familiarity.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionDesc: What are you seeking to heal, understand, or explore?
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. You are ready for the journey. We look forward to guiding you.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your answers. Please try again.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: This is a record of the answers you submitted.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted any answers yet.

noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You haven't been assigned to any ceremonies. Explore our upcoming events to find your path.
coursesDescription: Prepare for your journey with these essential videos. We recommend watching the required courses before your ceremony.
noCoursesInCategory: No courses available in this category.

deleteCourseConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the course. Are you sure?
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all users of the application.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in the system.

emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear community, we have an exciting update for you...

assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user is registered for.

chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am the Spiritual Guide from El Arte de Sanar. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
themeCustomizationDescription: Adjust the color palette for the entire application. Changes are applied live. Remember to save!
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the new theme.
backupSubtitle: Manage your application's data by creating backups or restoring from a file.
exportDataDescription: Download all your Firestore data (users, ceremonies, etc.) into a single JSON file. Keep it safe!
importDataDescription: Restore your application from a previously exported JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This will overwrite all current data in the database with the content from the file. This action cannot be undone.
rollbackCardDescription: A backup was automatically created before your last import. You can roll back to this state if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the database to the state it was in right before your last import. Are you sure?
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the AI spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review system errors recorded from the application.
systemLogsDescription: A list of errors caught by the system.
deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all error logs permanently? This action cannot be undone.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this log permanently?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the recorded error.
